Class DBManager

    Newman Souza, Seth Moore

    • Method Detail

      • loadInventory

        public Inventory loadInventory()
        Loads Inventory from database.
        Returns:
        The Seller's inventory
        Precondition:
        Database file is valid and available in file system
        Postcondition:
        The Seller's inventory is loaded

      • saveInventory

        public void saveInventory(Inventory inventory)
        Saves Inventory to database.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The Seller's inventory
        Precondition:
        inventory is a valid reference
        Postcondition:
        The Seller's inventory is saved to file

      • loadUserList

        public UserList loadUserList()
        Loads the list of users from database.
        Returns:
        The list of users
        Precondition:
        Database file is valid and available in file system
        Postcondition:
        The list of users is loaded

      • saveUserList

        public void saveUserList(UserList userList)
        Saves the list of users to database.
        Parameters:
        userList - The list of users
        Precondition:
        userList is a valid reference
        Postcondition:
        The list of users is saved to file

        public Inventory loadInventory(java.lang.String filename)
        Method used for testing purposes. Calls loadInventory().
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Inventory saved in filename
